title: Post Game - Stuck in Load Screen
body: When I finish a league game I get the League of Legends loading L, and that lasts about 60 seconds after each game. So finish a game, get a load screen for a minute, then get to the post load screen. Any ideas?

replies.body:
When you finish a match, your network has to drop the connection to the game servers and make a new connection to the normal client servers. Since you get stuck on the 'loading L' for a little while, it sounds like your network is having difficulty making that new connection. Go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you can get a more stable connection running.

Hit me back up if you have any other issues!
